mapper.sql: ids, fname, filename, filepath, filetype, comlevl, photos, filesize, descp, status

fname,
filename,
filepath,
filetype,
comlevl,
photos,
filesize,
descp,
status,

mapper.update:
update mh_medias
fname = #{fname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filetype = #{filetype,jdbcType=TINYINT},
comlevl = #{comlevl,jdbcType=TINYINT},
photos = #{photos,jdbcType=INTEGER},
filesize = #{filesize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
descp = #{descp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where ids = #{ids,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mh_medias set fname = #{fname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filetype = #{filetype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, comlevl = #{comlevl,jdbcType=TINYINT}, photos = #{photos,jdbcType=INTEGER}, filesize = #{filesize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, descp = #{descp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where ids = #{ids,jdbcType=INTEGER}
